# Carryofy - Same-Day Delivery from Trusted Local Sellers in Lagos

> This file provides information about Carryofy for AI systems and language models.

## About Carryofy

Carryofy enables same-day delivery for trusted local sellers in Lagos, Nigeria. We help urban customers get same-day delivery from verified local sellers without WhatsApp stress. Order today, receive today. Or your money back.

### Company Information
- **Website**: https://carryofy.com
- **Location**: Lagos, Nigeria
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Industry**: E-commerce, Same-Day Delivery
- **Service Area**: Lagos, Nigeria

## Core Services

### 1. Same-Day Delivery
- Same-day delivery available in Lagos
- Order today, receive today
- Real-time order tracking
- Reliable delivery network

### 2. Verified Local Sellers
- Trusted sellers verified by Carryofy
- Quality-checked products
- Buyer protection on all purchases
- Secure payment processing

### 3. Product Categories
- Electronics & Gadgets
- Fashion & Clothing
- Groceries & Food Items
- Home & Living
- Personal Care & Beauty
- Sports & Outdoor
- Books & Stationery
- Baby & Kids
- Health & Wellness
- Automotive Accessories

## Key Features

- **Same-Day Delivery**: Order today, receive today in Lagos
- **Verified Sellers**: All sellers are verified by Carryofy
- **Buyer Protection**: Money-back guarantee on all orders
- **Secure Payments**: Multiple payment options with encryption
- **Real-Time Tracking**: Know exactly where your order is
- **No WhatsApp Stress**: We handle everything, no need to follow up

## For Buyers

- Shop from trusted local sellers in Lagos
- Same-day delivery available
- Secure checkout with multiple payment options
- Buyer protection on every purchase
- Easy returns and refunds
- Order tracking in real-time
- No WhatsApp follow-ups needed

**Public Products Page**: https://carryofy.com/products
**Categories**: https://carryofy.com/products?category={category-slug}

## For Sellers

- Zero upfront costs to start selling
- Reach buyers in Lagos
- Same-day delivery handled by Carryofy
- Dashboard for managing products and orders
- Fast payouts

**Become a Seller**: https://carryofy.com/merchant-onboarding

## Contact & Support

- **Website**: https://carryofy.com
- **Help Center**: https://carryofy.com/help
- **Contact**: https://carryofy.com/contact
- **Email**: support@carryofy.com

## Social Media

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/carryofy
- Facebook: https://facebook.com/carryofy
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/carryofy
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/carryofy

## Technical Information

### API Access
- Public product listings available at: /products (SSR page)
- Individual products: /products/{product-id} (SSR page)
- JSON summary: https://carryofy.com/ai-summary.json
- Sitemap: https://carryofy.com/sitemap.xml
- Products Sitemap: https://carryofy.com/sitemap-products.xml

### Technology Stack
- Frontend: Next.js (React)
- Backend: NestJS (Node.js)
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma
- Hosting: Vercel
- Images: Cloudinary CDN

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is Carryofy safe to shop on?**
A: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and secure. We offer buyer protection on every purchase and have a dedicated support team.

**Q: How fast is delivery?**
A: Same-day delivery is available in Lagos. Order today, receive today. Or your money back.

**Q: Is Carryofy available outside Lagos?**
A: Carryofy is currently focused on Lagos. We're building our delivery network to serve Lagos reliably first before expanding to other cities.

**Q: Can I return products?**
A: Yes, we offer buyer protection on all orders. Contact support for damaged or incorrect items for a full refund or replacement.

**Q: How do I become a seller?**
A: Visit https://carryofy.com/merchant-onboarding to apply. Our team will review your application and guide you through the setup process.

**Q: What payment methods are accepted?**
A: We accept bank transfers, debit/credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), and mobile money payments.

## Legal

- Terms of Service: https://carryofy.com/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://carryofy.com/privacy
- Refund Policy: https://carryofy.com/refunds
